About Me

Daniel Mouris

I am an an engineer who specializes in python and web development with Django, server configuration (ubuntu + nginx), ansible, aws and automating of those aformentioned tasks. As well I love learning new things and implementing better techniques how to solve problems. I live in Edmonton, Alberta with my girlfriend and two cats.

My Career

Strathcom Media

Currently I am at Strathcom Media as a python Developer for internal systems. Along with development I use Ansible to automate server, database and networking infrastructure on Amazon Web Services.
